title: I Only Want To Meet You
alternative_title: Only for you,下凡只为遇见你
status: Only for you,下凡只为遇见你
description:
Description :
        Boy meets dragon girl. Boy released dragon girl from 1000 year old sleep. Boy get’s engaged with said dragon and live happily…no, WRONG STORY!!! This is a story about an ordinary boy who was the reincarnation soul of the god of matchmaking apprentice. Meet Jin Fairytale when he suddenly finds out he is turning into a god and had to resume his previous duty as the god of matchmaking apprentice in the modern world and juggle the responsibility of living a normal life and having to babysit the dragon girl he accidentally released. See Jin go on an adventure with his partner dragon girl and tying the red strings of fate to fellow lovers…but something went horrible wrong in this world. A man is in love with a chicken? This guy is into another guy? Hello? It’s actually the soul of the girl?
